tossup_question: 5) EARTH AND SPACE  Ocean tides of diminished range are called:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) spring tides
 X) neap tides 
Y) diurnal tides 
Z) semi-diurnal tides
bonus_question: 5) EARTH AND SPACE  Which of the following was a time when glaciation was minimal on Earth:
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Cretaceous Period 
X) Quaternary Period 
Y) Holocene Epoch 
Z) Pleistocene Epoch
